thread.title: Beyoncé and Jay Z Just Dropped a New Song
thread.title_full: Beyoncé and Jay Z Just Dropped a New Song

title: Beyoncé and Jay Z Just Dropped a New Song
text:
Beyoncé and Jay Z Just Dropped a New Song 
Listen to DJ Khaled's "Shining." Most Popular By Kristina Rodulfo Feb 13, 2017 Beyoncé may not have won album of the year at tonight's Grammys , but she's still giving us the surprise gift of new music. Following the show, DJ Khaled debuted "Shining," featuring Bey and Jay Z, on Tidal . It's the first single from his upcoming album Grateful, and the track is the first the couple have been on together since "Drunk In Love" from Beyonce in 2013. A photo posted by DJ KHALED (@djkhaled) on Feb 12, 2017 at 8:43pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Listen to the new song: #NowPlaying "Shining" by Dj Khaled, Beyoncé, JAY Z in @TIDALHiFi https://t.co/tGIh6bDDg4
